item.title: Happy Diwali: Ram Charan, Karan Johar And Many Tollywood & Bollywood Actors Extended Festive Wishes Through Social Media
item.description: Happy Diwali: Ram Charan, Karan Johar And Many Tollywood & Bollywood Actors Extended Festive Wishes Through Social Media Ram Charan, Junior NTR, Ajay Devgn and a few others extended festival wishes to all their fans…Ram Charan shared his pics from Japan and wished all his fans…

item.title: Yashoda poster: Samantha Ruth Prabhu blushes as friends teaser her, see photo
item.description: Yashoda poster: Samantha Ruth Prabhu blushes as friends teaser her, see photo Production house Sridevi Movies on Monday shared a new poster for the upcoming film Yashoda , which features Samantha Ruth Prabhu in the lead role.
